title: Q&A on Superheroes, Skill Tests, and Mindset at Retirement
description: Tom Bilyeu and Cindy field questions from the Impact Theory Community including: Tom, who is your favorite Super hero, and what was the most IMPACTful moment in comic book history for you personally. And how do comic books fit into modern day mythology? Have you considered having a guest perform one of their key skills with you and then deconstruct it during the show? (e.g. red teaming with Tim Ferriss) Tom I'm thinking of leaving my secure job with a great pension. I want to go into teaching but I still want to be more secure in what I want to do. Any suggestions? Wish I had had this content when I was 20 instead of 70. Listen up when you are young enough to put these life and job skills to work for you. Any suggestions for us retired folks? And more... Tom Bilyeu is the co-founder of 2014 Inc. 500 company Quest Nutrition — a unicorn startup valued at over $1 billion — and the co-founder and host of Impact Theory. Impact Theory is a first-of-its-kind company designed to facilitate global change through the incubation of mission-based businesses and the cultivation of empowering content. Every piece of content Impact Theory creates is meant to underscore the company mission to free people from The Matrix and help them unlock their true potential. Impact Theory exists to inspire the next generation of game-changing companies and creators that will make a true and lasting impact on the world.   FOLLOW TOM BILYEU TWITTER: http://bit.ly/2iyjY5P INSTAGRAM: http://bit.ly/2j7vqX8 FACEBOOK: http://bit.ly/2hPStWo   FOLLOW IMPACT THEORY TWITTER: http://bit.ly/2iC5lN3 INSTAGRAM: http://bit.ly/2hPSGJa FACEBOOK: http://bit.ly/2iystOf
